cleaned_text: 448-2221](tel:1-708-4482221) (call or [text](tel:1-708-4482221)) Aromatherapy Aromatherapy is the practice of using plant essential oils to bring balance and healing to body, mind and spirit. The chemistry of the body and mind can be altered via the olfactory (the most ancient of all our senses) by inhaling (directly or ambiently) or rubbing these precious plant oils on the skin. About Uttati Oils ~ from Uttatioils.com In the Egyptian language, the term Uttati means both the Sun and the Moon. It represents the harmony, balance, well-being and health offered by Uttati Corp through its essential oils Line of products. Uttati brings a unique perspective to the production and use of essential oils for emotional, mental, physical and spiritual healing.
